Package com.example.matata

Class ViewEventUnitTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.matata.ViewEventUnitTest
@Config(shadows=org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowSystemClock.class, manifest="--none") public class ViewEventUnitTest extends Object
Runs tests for the ViewEvent activity using Robolectric.

    • testUpdateButtonVisibility_AsOrganizer

      public void testUpdateButtonVisibility_AsOrganizer() throws NoSuchFieldException, IllegalAccessException
      Tests visibility of the draw button when the user is an organizer. Expected outcome: Draw button should be visible, waitlist button should be invisible.

      NoSuchFieldException
      IllegalAccessException

    • testUpdateButtonVisibility_AsNonOrganizer

      public void testUpdateButtonVisibility_AsNonOrganizer() throws NoSuchFieldException, IllegalAccessException
